mapper.select: SELECT STU_NO, NAME, KOR, ENG, MATH, AVE, GRADE FROM STUDENT_T ORDER BY STU_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT_T ( STU_NO , NAME , KOR , ENG , MATH , AVE , GRADE ) VALUES ( STUDENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{name} , #{kor} , #{eng} , #{math} , (#{kor} + #{eng} + #{math}) / 3 , CASE WHEN (#{kor} + #{eng} + #{math}) / 3 >= 90 THEN 'A' WHEN (#{kor} + #{eng} + #{math}) / 3 >= 80 THEN 'B' WHEN (#{kor} + #{eng} + #{math}) / 3 >= 70 THEN 'C' WHEN (#{kor} + #{eng} + #{math}) / 3 >= 60 THEN 'D' ELSE 'F' END )
mapper.select: SELECT A.RK, A.STU_NO, A.NAME, A.KOR, A.ENG, A.MATH, A.AVE, A.GRADE FROM (SELECT STU_NO, NAME, KOR, ENG, MATH, AVE, GRADE, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY AVE DESC) AS RK FROM STUDENT_T) A WHERE A.RK <= 3
